item.title: Bookmarks
item.description: A library of various bookmarks and websites I’ve kept over the years. Neatly sorted for ease of use! Last Updated: Jan 2023 Web Friends & Cool Sites ⬩ Pixoul's Site. ⬩ Lucas.love. ⬩ Ghettobastler. ⬩ Simon Panrucker's Site. ⬩ theSam.Zone. ⬩ Jag Talon. ⬩ jbauer's Site. item.title: Colophon
item.description: A comprehensive dive into the design, creation and philosophy of this site. Site Philosophy This site exists to scratch an itch I’ve long had. Sharing stuff on social media has never been my mojo, I’ll often post my photography, however I yearned for something more expansive and interesting, so I made a website. The design of this site was made with one goal in mind: create vibrant a site that looks good and is fun to use, with the smallest file size possible.

item.title: Setup
item.description: A short breakdown of my setup, the hardware and software I use for creating and doing everyday work. Hardware Keychron C1 Keyboard ∘ Lenovo Thinkpad E580 Laptop. - Going on 5 years old now, this was relatively cheap at the time for what it provided. Over the years I’ve upgraded it with an SSD, more ram and so on. In 2021, I switched to using Fedora Linux from Windows and it’s been an incredibly smooth experience.
